description:
Hiiragi Shuuji, a ministry of health, labour, and welfare worker, asks the Hamatora to bring in a man manufacturing Ideal in Okinawa. Nice and Murasaki resume going undercover in Yokohamabane High School and go to Okinawa, where they are dragged into a rivalry (?) between the school and a local high school...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des concombres amers tachés de sang
